description.first_span: an established provider of software development services and a Hi-Tech Park resident, is looking for a candidate to Help our Business Development Department with lead generation process.
description.first_p: To be perfect match you should have/be:

ul.first_li: Upper-intermidate level of English(ability to hold a decent conversatoin via phone/email is essential)
ul.third_li: Be ready to find win-win solution and do calls

description.second_span: German/ French / Danish as a second language
